name: Pumpkin Spice - Challenge
description:
Fall season starts with a great cup of pumpkin spice coffee.
Coffee is like a warm fireplace for your soul.

I invite you to challenge yourself at making the right amount of coffee.

It's easy to play:
1) Tap & Hold the coffee button
2) Wait for the coffee to reach your target
3) Release the coffee button

Sounds easy? Well, I bet you can't reach level 110.
May your game experience be 'brewtiful'
